EmailTemplate.name: EIN Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. We are not able to use the EIN document for program qualification. We do need a copy of the original IRS 501C3 letter or the state-issued document designating the organization is nonprofit. We keep these records on file for audit purposes. Please reply to this email with your information.
I look forward to working with you!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
